content: I think I'll also add a caption to my Reel that says something like "Summer vibes only with my new sunglasses! #sunglasses #summerFashion #Reels" to encourage engagement and drive sales. And, I'll make sure to mention that I used #summerFashion on a post where I showed off my new sunglasses, and it got featured on a popular fashion influencer's page, giving me an extra 50 followers! That way, I can share my success story and attract more followers who are interested in fashion and beauty.
